title.narrative: EU-India Cooperation and Dialogue on Migration and Mobility (EU-India CAMM Project)

description.narrative: The overall objective of the project is to contribute to a better governance of migration and mobility between the EU and India, as well as to prevent and address the challenges related to irregular migratory flows. Its specific objective is to support the EU-India High Level Dialogue on Migration and Mobility (HLDMM) and the implementation of the Common Agenda for Migration and Mobility (CAMM) and its annex of actions. The following are the expected results of the project: Regular, structured and reliable dialogue on issues related to labour migration and mobility between India and the EU is strengthened; Improved knowledge base on migration flows between India and the EU; Enhanced legal, policy and administrative institutional capacity of India and the EU on the governance and management of labour migration; and International standards and best practices on the governance of migration implemented.

participating-org.narrative: Delegation of the European Union to India and Bhutan

department.narrative: Departement of Partnerships and Field Support (PARDEV)

sector.narrative: ILO Results Framework 2020-2021: Output 7.5. Increased capacity of constituents to develop fair and effective labour migration frameworks, institutions and services to protect migrant workers

transaction.ref: IND/17/03/EUR_OLD-2019-IND106 - By 2022, states have adopted policies and institutional mechanisms for safe and informed labour migration
